p: In addition, predictions were assessed using receiver operating characteristic (ROC) curves [ 42], which compare the TP rate ([0,1], y-axis) to the FP rate ([0,1], x-axis) at different classification thresholds. The diagonal corresponds to random class label prediction and an area under the ROC curve (AUC) value of 0.5. Increasing AUC values > 0.50 indicate increasing prediction accuracy, AUC = 1.0 resulting from a perfect prediction.
